Title: Eventum Reports
Description: This project serves to allow a user to draw in depth reports from an eventum Database. All reports are then shown graphically using microsoft Chart Controls.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project serves to allow a user to draw in depth reports from an eventum Database. All reports are then shown graphically using microsoft Chart Controls.

All Code is done in C# using .net Framework 3.5, a linq2mysql data layer is setu up.

PLEASE NOTE:
MySQL Connector Net 6.1.2 : http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/net/6.1.html
and
MySQL Connector/ODBC 5.1 : http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/odbc/5.1.html
is used for connecting to the MYSQL Database
